## DurableTestRunner.getOperationByNameAndIndex() method

Gets an operation by name and index when multiple operations have the same name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOperationByNameAndIndex(name: string, index: number): TDurableOperation;
```

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

number

</td><td>

The zero-based index among operations with the same name

**Returns:**

TDurableOperation

An operation instance for the specified named operation occurrence
